name: Screenshot Component
description: Capture a screenshot of a component or entire layout for visual testing and debugging. Returns a data URL that can be saved to history for comparison. Useful for visual regression testing and documenting UI state.

componentId.description: The ID of the component to screenshot (e.g., 'form-1', 'table-results'). If omitted, captures the entire layout container.

format.description: Image format for the screenshot. PNG provides lossless quality, JPEG is smaller, WebP offers best compression.

quality.description: Image quality for lossy formats (0.0 to 1.0). Higher values mean better quality but larger file size.

fullPage.description: Capture the entire scrollable area instead of just the visible viewport. Useful for long components.

saveToHistory.description: Save screenshot to history for later comparison (keeps last 20). Set to false for one-off captures.
